Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
In accordance with IMTAR – 21, Subpart C1, 21.C1.18, Subpart C2, 21.C2.9 & Subpart C3, 21.C3.1.20.
Part - I (Reference): Incident /Accident/ Snag / Explosive
a) Defect Report (DR) No: DR/2023/0301 b) Date of Occurrence: 04/05/2024
c) Installation Details: Phoenix Recon - AC-6553-619 at
Zone-1 Facility
Part - II: (Details of Defective Component)
a) Trade: Electrical b) Date Component 12/05/2024
Received:
c) System/Sub System: Power Distribution d) Main Assembly: Station-4 Port
e) Nomenclature: Power Distribution Assembly Unit f) MOD Status: Standard
g) Part No.: EL-9607-R7 h) Sl No.: SN-3560-415
i) Firmware Version: FW-1.20.874 j) Software Version: Not Applicable
k) Date of Installation: 01/02/2023 l) Date of Removal: 11/05/2024
Pg No: 135 Ln No: 19 Pg No: 82 Ln No: 29
m) Manufacturing Agency: Elite Aerospace Solutions n) Date, Month & Year September 2015
of Manufacturing:
o) Whether under warranty: Yes p) Whether under AMC No
/ Repair Contract:
q) Life completed since New: 2416 Hrs / 1344 Cycles

--- Page 2 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Circuit breaker tripping under normal load. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Power Distribution component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: M - Other Reasons
Remarks: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 25/05/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

--- Page 3 (pdf_text) ---
Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part VI: Remarks by Quality Dept.
Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type.
Date: 26/05/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai
Part VII: Remarks by User(Project):(if applicable)
User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations.
Date: 29/05/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta
Part VIII: Remarks by ORDAQA (Quality Aspects)
Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions.
Date: 29/05/2024 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta
Part IX: Remarks by CEMILAC / RCMA (Design Aspects)
Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable.
Date: 01/06/2024 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh
Edition Number: 1.0 Form Version Number: 1.0 Date: January 2021
